datoCmsKey.name: Taylor Jo Poer
datoCmsKey.discipline: AEA Stage Manager / Production Manager / Producer / Electrician
datoCmsKey.bio:
Taylor Jo Poer (she/her) is an NYC-based AEA stage manager hailing from the Midwest. She is an avid dog-lover, crafter and TV and podcast streaming junkie. She is constantly on the lookout for ways to facilitate and help the arts, and by extension society, become more inclusive for anyone and everyone. 
taylorbackstage.com
